name: Running Out Of Space, In Space!
name_original: Running Out Of Space, In Space!
description:
Your are an escaped prisoner caught by the police, With Lasers on all sides, you have no choice but to fight to the death, taking as many of them as possible with you to the other side, Try to survive as long as possible

we hope you enjoy our Game!

Programming & Design by : “Fireyoyo” Art & Music by : “Mr34”

we’re a small group of friends who’ve wanted to make games for a long time, we’ve been training with making games for about 2 years now but we’ve still got a long way to go, this is our first ludum dare and we hope to start joining more of them in the future
